title: Nether Earth
short_description: This is a texturepack designed to take the feel of the nether and add it to the normal world.
full_description:
This is a texturepack designed to take the feel of the nether and add it to the normal world.

Now you can get that bloody scary feeling you have every time you enter the nether.

title: BoxCraft
short_description: Texture pack with a minimalist style, as almost all blocks become uniform, which looks quite beautiful
full_description:
**BoxCraft** is a texture pack with a minimalist style, as almost all blocks become uniform, which looks quite beautiful. True, all ores will now look a bit unusual, but it’s easy to get used to.

**How to install BoxCraft:**
1. Download and install Block Launcher.
2. Download the texture pack using the link below.
3. Launch Block Launcher and tap the icon at the top of the screen.
4. Tap “BL Settings” → “Texture Pack” → “Import” → “Phone Storage”.
5. Select the texture pack file.
6. Done.
